meanings.sent1: I will preslice the vegetables before cooking.
meanings.sent2: It is helpful to preslice the bread for the party.
meanings.sent3: The chef presliced the ingredients and saved time in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: She presliced through the cake like a skilled baker.
meanings.sent5: Preslicing the fruit made the preparation process much smoother.

meanings.sent1: The presliced cheese made sandwich-making faster.
meanings.sent2: I bought presliced ham for convenience.
meanings.sent3: The presliced pizza looked tempting in the store.
meanings.sent4: Her presliced apples were a hit at the picnic.
meanings.sent5: The presliced bread was perfect for making toast quickly.
